players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed on night 1, so we know one of Alice or Bob is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our vote since with only 3 of us left, one wrong vote could end the game."
You: "I agree we must be careful. Since Charlie was killed, it means the mafioso is among us three. Diana, why are you so quick to narrow it down to just Alice or Bob?"
Bob: "Diana, your logic is flawed. The mafioso could be any of us three. Why are you trying to focus suspicion on just Alice and me?"
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed she is guilty. We must vote for Alice to win."
You: "Bob, if you were the detective, why didn't you share your investigation result immediately? You're making this up now because you're the real mafioso trying to frame me."

Diana: "Bob's claim to be the detective is suspicious - if he really investigated Alice and found her guilty, why wait until after Alice and I spoke to reveal this crucial information? A real detective would lead with that."
